VitePress

Appearance

On this page

Users API ​

Manage users (Admin only).

List Users ​

POST /api/users/get

Returns all users in the system.

Create User ​

POST /api/users/create

Request:

json
{
  "email": "newuser@example.com",
  "password": "securepassword",
  "role": "user"
}

Delete User ​

DELETE /api/users/delete

Request:

json
{
  "id": 1
}

Admin Only

These endpoints require admin role.

See server/api/handlers/auth/users.go for details.
